column2: BRIEF-Ennis Says On May 2, Co Through A Unit Acquired Allen-Bailey Tag & Label May 3 (Reuters) - Ennis Inc: * ENNIS SAYS ON MAY 2, CO THROUGH A UNIT ACQUIRED ALLEN-BAILEY TAG & LABEL IN A PURCHASE OF ASSETS & ASSUMPTION OF TRADE PAYABLES - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2FEO7bI) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Ennis Inc Q4 Revenue $87.1 Million April 24 (Reuters) - Ennis Inc: * ENNIS, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED FEBRUARY 28, 2018 AND SETS RECORD DATE FOR ANNUAL SHAREHOLDER MEETING * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 0.6 PERCENT TO $87.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
